item.description:
This Month's Girl's Night:

1. Date: Saturday, August 13th at 5pm

2.  Location: Linda E.'s House in Pownal

3.  Host: Linda E.

4.  Theme: Southern Comfort Food 

We'll relax out on the deck, enjoy each others' company, and enjoy some good ole Southern Comfort Food!

Please sign up to bring one of the following by adding a comment at the bottom of this page after you RSVP:

1. Disposable Plates, Cups, Silverware, & Napkins

2. Grandmother's Buttermilk Corn Bread - http://allrecipes.com/Recipe/Grandmothers-Buttermilk-Cornbread/Detail.aspx

3. Southern Chicken Fried Steak - (Bring the ingredients and we can make this at Linda's) - http://allrecipes.com/Recipe/Southern-Chicken-Fried-Steak/Detail.aspx

4. Collard Greens - http://allrecipes.com/Recipe/Southern-Collard-Greens/Detail.aspx

5. Alabama Sweet Tea - http://allrecipes.com/Recipe/Good-Ol-Alabama-Sweet-Tea/Detail.aspx

6. Mint Juleps - http://allrecipes.com/Recipe/Mint-Juleps/Detail.aspx

7. Shrimp & Okra Gumbo - http://allrecipes.com/Recipe/Shrimp-and-Okra-Gumbo/Detail.aspx

8. Sweet Potatoes - http://allrecipes.com/Recipe/Praline-Sweet-Potatoes/Detail.aspx

9. Southern Peach Cobbler - http://allrecipes.com/Recipe/Southern-Peach-Cobbler-2/Detail.aspx

10. Best Fried Green Tomato's - (Bring the ingredients and we can make them at Linda's) http://allrecipes.com/Recipe/Best-Fried-Green-Tomatoes/Detail.aspx

11. Hamburgers & Buns

12. Hot Dogs & Buns

13. Condiments (Ketchup, Mustard, Relish)

14. Fresh Garden Salad

15. Ultimate Strawberry Shortcake - http://www.food.com/recipe/the-ultimate-strawberry-shortcake-24672

16. Sweet Corn Succotash - http://www.foodandwine.com/recipes/sweet-corn-succotash

17. Peel & Eat Shrimp with Barbecue Spices - http://www.foodandwine.com/recipes/peel-and-eat-shrimp-with-barbecue-spices

18. Fresh Fruit - Grapes, Strawberries, Blueberries etc

19. Watermelon Salad with Mint & LIme - http://www.foodandwine.com/recipes/watermelon-salad-with-mint-and-lime

20. Tomato, Mozzarella, & Basil Bruscetta - http://www.foodnetwork.com/recipes/giada-de-laurentiis/tomato-mozzarella-and-basil-bruschetta-recipe/index.html
item.how_to_find_us: Linda will be answering the door.
item.name: Girls Night! Theme: Southern Comfort Food
